io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.post

Class Bloom

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.post.MultiEffect
      • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.post.Bloom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostEffect

    public class Bloom
extends MultiEffect
    An effect that causes bright areas of the screen to bleed.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
    See Also:
    Blur, HighPass
